entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
